body:
So, I have been doing some thinking.... What would you like to see? Would you like to see a community event where we do a UHC? Both community and staff would take part and it will be mixed teams. Depending on how many people take part, we can have teams of 2 up to about 20? (Remember this is a work in progress so give your suggestions.) We want to do what you would like to see. So tell us <3

-Ya boi tel
body_tagged:
So, I have been doing some thinking.... What would you like to see? Would you like to see a community event where we do a UHC? Both community and staff would take part and it will be mixed teams. Depending on how many people take part, we can have teams of 2 up to about 20? (Remember this is a work in progress so give your suggestions.) We want to do what you would like to see. So tell us <3

-Ya boi tel

replies.body:
Avicus is starting to look like Badlion and OCN, I like it even thought I don't play OCN because I'm banned.
I think this UHC should be made and you should add some plugins into it like for example, if someone logs of or times out, then he can join again (If he hasn't died nor the UHC has ended). Also, you should put a time-line 1 week before the UHC.
But.. now talking about the communication, if we let people choose their team, probably, their would be a big army full of people in TS, but.. if we make random teams, there would be a silence in every Skype call, TS room, etc so you should find an answer for this.
replies.body_tagged:
Avicus is starting to look like Badlion and OCN, I like it even thought I don't play OCN because I'm banned.
I think this UHC should be made and you should add some plugins into it like for example, if someone logs of or times out, then he can join again (If he hasn't died nor the UHC has ended). Also, you should put a time-line 1 week before the UHC.
But.. now talking about the communication, if we let people choose their team, probably, their would be a big army full of people in TS, but.. if we make random teams, there would be a silence in every Skype call, TS room, etc so you should find an answer for this.

replies.body:
We will base this idea around what you guys want so all ideas are welcomed and considered. Thanks everyone this is starting to take shape.

The idea of chosen teams or pick your teams will be developed a bit more since we need to uncover the pros and cons of all of these. However for the people who aren't experienced have no idea what is happening, they can be paired with staff or more experienced players.
replies.body_tagged:
We will base this idea around what you guys want so all ideas are welcomed and considered. Thanks everyone this is starting to take shape.

The idea of chosen teams or pick your teams will be developed a bit more since we need to uncover the pros and cons of all of these. However for the people who aren't experienced have no idea what is happening, they can be paired with staff or more experienced players.

replies.body:
Yes, having a mix and match would definitely work out.

We would need:
~Team communication system, weather TS or /msg, or just a team chat plugin.
~List of all contenders so we could make teams, if we chose partners.
~A map, maybe get the Map Team to get a roll on with that.
~And a set of times for everyone to see: On the forums; broadcasts in game and maybe even messages at hubs.
~Staff meeting to discuss the whole layout of a UHC, if it was to happen.
~And of course a ton of cows...

Ok, maybe not the last one ;D

replies.body:
This sounds like a really good idea. I think that the best way to do an ultra hardcore would be to install a mod that creates clans and you can add people to a clan. That is just my personal opinion, but I think that clans would be the best option so you could know who is on what team.

Here is a link to a clan mod incase you are wondering..
link: http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/simpleclans/
